trans-unit.source: Access the Monitoring Interface

seg-source.mrk: Access the Monitoring Interface

target.mrk: Accéder à l'interface de supervision

trans-unit.source: The dashboard (<MadCap:xref href="#Agent_dashboard_parameters" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) enables you to view information about the current configuration of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, and to view the protection activity in real time.

seg-source.mrk: The dashboard (<MadCap:xref href="#Agent_dashboard_parameters" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) enables you to view information about the current configuration of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, and to view the protection activity in real time.

target.mrk: Le tableau de bord (<MadCap:xref href="#Agent_dashboard_parameters" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) vous permet d'afficher des informations sur la configuration actuelle de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />, et de visualiser l'activité de protection en temps réel.

trans-unit.source: Right-click on the icon and select .

seg-source.mrk: Right-click on the icon and select .

target.mrk: Cliquez avec le bouton droit sur l'icône et sélectionnez .

trans-unit.source: Dashboard

seg-source.mrk: Dashboard

target.mrk: Tableau de bord

trans-unit.source: Each dashboard card in the interface presents information about the protection of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent (<MadCap:xref href="#Agent_dashboard_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

seg-source.mrk: Each dashboard card in the interface presents information about the protection of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> agent (<MadCap:xref href="#Agent_dashboard_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: Chaque carte du tableau de bord de l'interface présente différentes informations sur la protection de l'agent <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> (<MadCap:xref href="#Agent_dashboard_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>) :

trans-unit.source: Agent dashboard parameters

seg-source.mrk: Agent dashboard parameters

target.mrk: Paramètres du tableau de bord de l'agent

trans-unit.source: Dashboard card

seg-source.mrk: Dashboard card

target.mrk: Carte du tableau de bord

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Protection

seg-source.mrk: Protection

target.mrk: Protection

trans-unit.source: Indicates the protection status of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. These are the possible statuses:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the protection status of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
These are the possible statuses:

target.mrk: Indique l'état de protection de l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Voici les états possibles :

trans-unit.source: Protected The agent is fully protected. There is no new modifications to send to the server.

seg-source.mrk: Protected The agent is fully protected.
There is no new modifications to send to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

target.mrk: Protégé L'agent est entièrement protégé.
Il n’y a pas de nouvelles modifications à envoyer au serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Processing The agent is sending objects to the server.

seg-source.mrk: Processing The agent is sending objects to the server.

target.mrk: Traitement en cours L’agent envoie des objets au serveur .

trans-unit.source: Analyzing The agent is detecting changes.

seg-source.mrk: Analyzing The agent is detecting changes.

target.mrk: Analyse en cours L'agent est en cours de détection des modifications.

trans-unit.source: Modifications detected The agent has detected new or modified data to back up.

seg-source.mrk: Modifications detected The agent has detected new or modified data to back up.

target.mrk: Modifications détectées L'agent a détecté de nouvelles données ou des modifications à sauvegarder.

trans-unit.source: Protection paused You have suspended the protection.

seg-source.mrk: Protection paused You have suspended the protection.

target.mrk: Protection suspendue Vous avez suspendu la protection.

trans-unit.source: Disconnected The agent cannot reach the server.

seg-source.mrk: Disconnected The agent cannot reach the server.

target.mrk: Déconnecté L'agent ne peut pas atteindre le serveur .

trans-unit.source: Resynchronizing The agent database is resynchronized from the server.

seg-source.mrk: Resynchronizing The agent database is resynchronized from the server.

target.mrk: Resynchronisation La base de données de l’agent est resynchronisée à partir des informations du serveur .

trans-unit.source: Network paused The network connection is blocked due to a network option set. See Configuring Network and Bandwidth for details.

seg-source.mrk: Network paused The network connection is blocked due to a network option set.

See <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Network_and_Bandwidth.htm#client_config_403703647_1264536" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring Network and Bandwidth</MadCap:xref> for details.

target.mrk: Connexion réseau suspendue La connexion réseau est bloquée par une option réseau.

Voir <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Network_and_Bandwidth.htm#client_config_403703647_1264536" target="_blank" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring Network and Bandwidth</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: Missing CDP module The agent cannot access the CDP module which is supposed to be present on the platform.

seg-source.mrk: Missing CDP module The agent cannot access the CDP module which is supposed to be present on the platform.

target.mrk: Module CDP manquant L’agent ne peut pas accéder au module CDP qui est censé être présent sur la plateforme.

trans-unit.source: Scan Mode The agent is running on a platform which does not support CDP.

seg-source.mrk: Scan Mode The agent is running on a platform which does not support CDP.

target.mrk: Mode Scan L'agent est exécuté sur une plateforme qui ne prend pas en charge le CDP.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the status of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> server. These are the possible statuses:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the status of the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable> server.
These are the possible statuses:

target.mrk: Indique l'état du serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd"></MadCap:variable>.
Voici les états possibles :

trans-unit.source: Active The server is protecting the agent.

seg-source.mrk: Active The server is protecting the agent.

target.mrk: Actif Le serveur protège l’agent.

trans-unit.source: Quota limit reached The quota set for this agent has been reached. The server will not protect new data.

seg-source.mrk: Quota limit reached The quota set for this agent has been reached.
The <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server will not protect new data.

target.mrk: Quota de remplissage atteint Le quota défini pour cet agent a été atteint.
Le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> ne protégera pas les nouvelles données.

trans-unit.source: Agent unauthorized The agent is not declared on the server.

seg-source.mrk: Agent unauthorized The agent is not declared on the server.

target.mrk: Agent non autorisé L’agent n’est pas déclaré sur le serveur .

trans-unit.source: Maintenance The server is busy and is unable to back up the agent data.

seg-source.mrk: Maintenance The server is busy and is unable to back up the agent data.

target.mrk: Maintenance Le serveur est occupé et ne peut pas sauvegarder les données de l'agent.

trans-unit.source: Indicates also:

seg-source.mrk: Indicates also:

target.mrk: Indique également :

trans-unit.source: Date and time when agent files were last sent to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

seg-source.mrk: Date and time when agent files were last sent to the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server.

target.mrk: Date et heure auxquelles les fichiers de l'agent ont été envoyés pour la dernière fois au serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Protected volume.

seg-source.mrk: Protected volume.

target.mrk: Volume protégé.

trans-unit.source: Number of protected files.

seg-source.mrk: Number of protected files.

target.mrk: Nombre de fichiers protégés.

trans-unit.source: Processing

seg-source.mrk: Processing

target.mrk: En cours de traitement

trans-unit.source: Displays in a graph the backed up data in KB/s or MB/s.

seg-source.mrk: Displays in a graph the backed up data in KB/s or MB/s.

target.mrk: Affiche sous forme de graphique les données sauvegardées en Ko/s ou Mo/s.

trans-unit.source: Network activity

seg-source.mrk: Network activity

target.mrk: Activité du réseau

trans-unit.source: Displays in a graph the outgoing network traffic in KB/s.

seg-source.mrk: Displays in a graph the outgoing network traffic in KB/s.

target.mrk: Affiche sous forme de graphique le trafic réseau sortant en Ko/s.

trans-unit.source: Backup

seg-source.mrk: Backup

target.mrk: Sauvegarde

trans-unit.source: Displays the backup activity on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />. You can click on the dashboard card to view the list of backed up files.

seg-source.mrk: Displays the backup activity on the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
You can click on the dashboard card to view the list of backed up files.

target.mrk: Affiche l'activité de sauvegarde sur l'<MadCap:variable name="ALN.aln.agent" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.
Vous pouvez cliquer sur la carte du tableau de bord pour afficher la liste des fichiers sauvegardés.

trans-unit.source: Current Item Path and name of the object which is being backed up.

seg-source.mrk: Current Item Path and name of the object which is being backed up.

target.mrk: Chemin de l'élément actuel et nom de l'objet qui est sauvegardé.

trans-unit.source: Last Item Path and name of the last backed up objects.

seg-source.mrk: Last Item Path and name of the last backed up objects.

target.mrk: Chemin du dernier élément et nom des derniers objets sauvegardés.

trans-unit.source: General information

seg-source.mrk: General information

target.mrk: Informations générales

trans-unit.source: Displays the following information:

seg-source.mrk: Displays the following information:

target.mrk: Affiche les informations suivantes :

trans-unit.source: Agent name Name of the host.

seg-source.mrk: Agent name Name of the host.

target.mrk: Nom de l'agent Nom de l'hôte de l'.

trans-unit.source: Server name Name of the server host.

seg-source.mrk: Server name Name of the server host.

target.mrk: Nom du serveur Nom de l'hôte du serveur .

trans-unit.source: Recovery Point Objective (RPO) Defines the maximum time lapse between two protection sessions. The RPO indicates the maximum acceptable data loss if the data is restored between two sessions.

seg-source.mrk: Recovery Point Objective (RPO) Defines the maximum time lapse between two protection sessions.
The RPO indicates the maximum acceptable data loss if the data is restored between two sessions.

target.mrk: Perte de données maximale admissible (PDMA) Définit le laps de temps maximal entre deux sessions de protection.
La PDMA définit la perte de données maximale admissible si les données sont restaurées entre deux sessions de protection.

trans-unit.source: Compression Indicates the compression algorithm as defined in the Settings. See Configuring Network and Bandwidth for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Compression Indicates the compression algorithm as defined in the Settings.
See <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Network_and_Bandwidth.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring Network and Bandwidth</MadCap:xref> for more information.

target.mrk: Compression Indique l’algorithme de compression de vos données protégées lors de leur transfert sur le réseau.
Voir <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Network_and_Bandwidth.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring Network and Bandwidth</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.

trans-unit.source: Protection for BMR Indicates a module to recover a complete Windows agent.

seg-source.mrk: Protection for BMR Indicates a module to recover a complete Windows agent.

target.mrk: Bare Metal Recovery (BMR) Indique un module pour restaurer un agent Windows complet.

trans-unit.source: Network information

seg-source.mrk: Network information

target.mrk: Informations réseau

trans-unit.source: Displays the following information:

seg-source.mrk: Displays the following information:

target.mrk: Affiche les informations suivantes :

trans-unit.source: Last connection Indicates the date and time when the agent last connected to the server.

seg-source.mrk: Last connection Indicates the date and time when the agent last connected to the server.

target.mrk: Dernière protection Indique la date et l'heure de la dernière connexion de l'agent au serveur .

trans-unit.source: Interface type Indicates the type of network interface used (e.g., Ethernet, Wi-Fi).

seg-source.mrk: Interface type Indicates the type of network interface used (e.g., Ethernet, Wi-Fi).

target.mrk: Type d'interface Indique le type d'interface réseau utilisée (p. ex. Ethernet, WiFi).

trans-unit.source: Gateway Indicates the gateway through which the connects to the server.

seg-source.mrk: Gateway Indicates the gateway through which the connects to the server.

target.mrk: Passerelle Indique la passerelle via laquelle l’ se connecte au serveur .

trans-unit.source: Encryption Indicates if data is encrypted or not.

seg-source.mrk: Encryption Indicates if data is encrypted or not.

target.mrk: Chiffrement Indique si les données sont chiffrées ou pas.

trans-unit.source: Bandwidth limit Indicates the amount of bandwidth used for data transfer, as defined in the Settings. See Configuring Network and Bandwidth for more information.

seg-source.mrk: Bandwidth limit Indicates the amount of bandwidth used for data transfer, as defined in the Settings.
See <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Network_and_Bandwidth.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring Network and Bandwidth</MadCap:xref> for more information.

target.mrk: Limite de bande passante de l'agent Indique la quantité de bande passante utilisée pour le transfert de données, telle que définie dans les Paramètres.
Voir <MadCap:xref href="Configure_Network_and_Bandwidth.htm" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Configuring Network and Bandwidth</MadCap:xref> pour plus de détails.
